pr_title: SAMZA-2425: Add support for sub-query in joins

timeline.message: SAMZA-2425: Add support for sub-query in joins

timeline.bodyText:
There're other kinds of RelNode which are not covered by instanceOf checks in recursive function. Do we need to handle other kinds of RelNode here? If not, why?
Can you please add a unit-test in JoinTranslator for these changes?
Just curious. Would the schema validations be applied on the result of the sub-queries within joins?
timeline.author: shanthoosh

replies.bodyText:
Very good questions.

In Samza Sql, we currently support only filters, projection and joins along with scan. Hence, only they are handled in this function.
There are end-to-end tests for each of these if conditions and for the new addition.
Schema validations for joins is not yet implemented.
replies.author: atoomula
